Package com.foreach.across.core.context

Class ClassPathScanningModuleDependencyResolver

java.lang.Object
com.foreach.across.core.context.ClassPathScanningModuleDependencyResolver
All Implemented Interfaces:
ModuleDependencyResolver
public class ClassPathScanningModuleDependencyResolver extends Object implements ModuleDependencyResolver
Implementation of ModuleDependencyResolver that uses a ClassPathScanningCandidateModuleProvider to determine the modules that can be resolved.
Author:
Arne Vandamme

    • resolveModule

      public Optional<AcrossModule> resolveModule(String moduleName, boolean requiredModule)
      Description copied from interface: ModuleDependencyResolver
      Attempts to resolve the module by name. The success of a resolving a module might depend on the required parameter, as a resolver could be configured to return required but not optional modules.
      Specified by:
      resolveModule in interface ModuleDependencyResolver
      Parameters:
      moduleName - Name of the module.
      requiredModule - If this is a required dependency.
      Returns:
      module instance
